description: Perform simple matrix plotting operations from outputs of FATCAT programs 3dNetCorr and 3dTrackID.

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.description: Supply names of parameters, separated by whitespace, for selecting from a matrix file

matr_in.title: Matrix Input
matr_in.description: Provide the set of matrix (*.grid or *.netcc) files by searchable path. This can be a globbable entry in quotes containing wildcard characters.

list_match.title: List Match
list_match.description: Provide the matrix (*.grid or *.netcc) files by explicit path, matched per file with a CSV subject ID.

out_ind_matr.title: Output Individual Matrix
out_ind_matr.description: Output individual matrix files of properties.

out_ind_1ddset.title: Output Individual 1D Dset
out_ind_1ddset.description: Output as a 1D dset, more easily readable by other programs.

hold_image.title: Hold Image
hold_image.description: Switch to hold the Python-produced image on the output screen until a key has been hit.

extern_labs_no.title: External Labels No
extern_labs_no.description: Switch to turn off the usage of user-defined labels in the *.grid/*.netcc files.

type_file.title: File Type
type_file.description: Select image format type (e.g., jpg, png, pdf).

dpi_file.title: DPI
dpi_file.description: Set resolution (dots per inch) of output image.

xlen_file.title: X-Length
xlen_file.description: Horizontal dimension of output saved image, in units of inches.

ylen_file.title: Y-Length
ylen_file.description: Vertical dimension of output saved image, in units of inches.

tight_layout_on.title: Tight Layout On
tight_layout_on.description: Use matplotlib's tight_layout() option to ensure no overlap of features in the image.

fig_off.title: Figure Off
fig_off.description: Switch if you don't want matrix figure output.

size_font.title: Font Size
size_font.description: Set font size for colorbar and title.

lab_size_font.title: Label Font Size
lab_size_font.description: Set font size for x- and y-axis labels.

cbar_off.title: Colorbar Off
cbar_off.description: Switch to not include a colorbar at the right side of the plot.

map_of_colors.title: Map of Colors
map_of_colors.description: Change the colormap style used in the plot.

cbar_int_num.title: Colorbar Interval Number
cbar_int_num.description: Set the number of intervals on the colorbar.

width_cbar_perc.title: Width of Colorbar Percentage
width_cbar_perc.description: Width of colorbar as percentage of width of the correlation matrix.

specifier.title: Specifier
specifier.description: Specify number formatting for the colorbar numbers (e.g., '%.4f' for four decimal places).

xtick_lab_off.title: X-axis Label Off
xtick_lab_off.description: Switch to turn off labels along the x- (horizontal) axis but leave those along the y- (vertical) axis.
